p: Recently the non-terpene aldehydes 2-butyl-2-octenal, 2-hexyl-2-decenal, and 2-octyl-2-dodecenal have each been detected in folded cold press orange oil at trace concentrations, confirmed with synthesized standards ( Abreu et al., 2017). These compounds are hexanal, octanal, and decanal self-aldol condensation products, respectively. These self-aldol condensation products have attractive organoleptic qualities according to aroma and taste evaluations.
